select a.fid as fid ,a.fname as fname,a.description as description,a.uptime as uptime, a.downtimes as downtimes,a.uid as uid,b.uname as uname,a.fstatus as fstatus from file a left join users b on a.uid = b.uid left join users c on (( a.todid=c.did and ISNULL(a.togid) and ISNULL(a.touid)) or (a.todid =c.did and a.togid=c.gid and ISNULL(a.touid)) or (a.todid = c.did and a.togid =c.gid and a.touid=c.uid)) where a.touid = #{touid} and a.fstatus = 1
and uptime>#{timefrom}
and #{timeto}>uptime
and fname like '%${fname}%'

select count(*) from file inner join users on ( todid=did and ISNULL(togid) and ISNULL(touid)) or (todid =did and togid=gid and ISNULL(touid)) or (todid = did and togid =gid and touid=users.uid) where users.uid=#{touid} and fstatus =1
and uptime >#{timefrom}
and #{timeto}>uptime
and fname like '%${fname}%'
mapper.update: update file set downtimes = downtimes+1 where fid = #{fid}
